text: Hi everyone, can anyone help in changing this reset password submit message. I want to hide the email field and change the text after the user submits the form on reset password page.
but <@U021JKWA1GB> how will i check the contact in a list with help on this event?

basically there is one particular list I have created for all the contacts and when any user fills the form, it should check the email in that particular list and if that contact email is in the list then the error message should be shown to the user.

In order to hide the email field you have to edit the _membership-reset-password-request.html_ file.
For the post submit text it's going to be trickier though. I think there's no way to do this with native HS currently, you'll have to come up with a custom solution using JavaScript.
<@U03QEU2MF5G> using a serverless function you can do this
